name: 2022 the 5th International Conference on Control and Computer Vision
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be double blind reviewed by program committee and technical committee, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9731-5), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
